title: feature extraction from images
description: IntroStep-by-step guide for extracting features from shapes by turning them into time-series. The functions are optimized for the Swedish Leaf Dataset as it is published on Kaggle. Data Scientists spend vast majority of their time by data preparation, not model optimization. So let's dive into that a bit. Here is the second part, it is more advanced and follows PEP8
